wikipedia_page.main: Lindy M. Grant, , (born 1952) is professor emerita of medieval history at the University of Reading, an honorary research fellow of the Courtauld Institute of Art, and a former president of the British Archaeological Association.  Grant is a specialist in Capetian France and its neighbours in the 11th to 13th centuries.
